```{r setup}
library(mastersproject)
```

```{r}
# read in shape file
nc <- st_read(system.file("shape/nc.shp", package="sf"))

# choose coordinate projection
nc_3857 <- st_transform(nc, 3857)

# create tile map
nc_3857$tile_map <- generate_map(nc_3857$geometry)

# plot tile map
ggplot(nc_3857) +
  geom_sf(aes(geometry = tile_map)) +
  geom_sf_text(aes(geometry = tile_map, label = NAME), angle = 45, size = 2)
```
